short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An internal tool used for finding the page number and indexed keywords for an ASIN.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We help users find what page their product is on and what search terms it is indexed for. Just enter an ASIN and a search phrase or some keywords and hit search to get started.
